'''Apulee''' was a [[Netherese]] shipwright who worked at [[Gallery Steamers]] in [[Eileanar]] until its destruction in {{yearlinkConvert|3520|NY}}.
document_data.Activities: Apulee served [[Stuckley]] as a work crew manager for the construction of [[flying ship]]s used in [[Netheril]]. He worked alongside fellow managers [[Fourcrow]], [[Gau]], and [[Bruck]].
